name: dark-mode-extension
description: Chrome extension to force dark mode on any website

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r icons dist/ && cp dist/src/popup/popup.html dist/popup.html && cp dist/icons/icon48.png dist/icons/icon48-disabled.png

author: Dark Mode Extension
